name: Grimscape
description:
Explore the open world and complete quests. Unlock cards for two character classes and build your deck to fight enemies in turned based combat.

Explore the open world
Explore world of Grimscape, visit cities and villages, travel trough forests and mountains to encounter new challenges.

Complete quests
Complete Fantasy RPG style quests and unlock new cards to add to your deck. Collect gold so you can buy food and survive tasks you take on.

Character classes
Two available character classes  Rogue and Mage. Unique cards for each class. More character classes will be added with upcoming game updates.

Build your deck
Grimscape is deck building turn based combat game. With every enemy defeated and quest completed you will be rewarded with a card to add to your deck.

Follow Grimscape on Twitter to keep up with development!

Early Access

  • Early access to the game
  • Game and content updates every month until game release
  • Unique Early Access rewards
  • New zones, cards and enemies with every game update
  • New character class Hunter in the works
  • Game saves automatically to prevent bugs and cheating
  • To start or load new game player must exit combat first
  • For bug report message me on Twitter @grimscapeworld or comment below
